dkeep.logic

Class Guard

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Guard

  • public class Guard
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that saves the guard info in a Dungeon type level, keeps record of the guard's path, its current position, its personality and if it is asleep in case of a drunken personality
    Author:
    Leonardo Capozzi, Ricardo Carvalho

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Guard(int[][] guardarray, int t)
      Creates a guard given its personality and its successive positions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[][] getGuard()
      Gets the guard path
      int getGuardpos()
      Gets the guard's current position in it's path
      void GuardMove(Map m)
      Moves the guard to it's next position in the path given its type (a rookie's next position index is current+1, a drunken may be asleep and may change movement direction when he wakes up, a suspicious guard may change its direction randomly); the method also updates the guard's position in the map.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Guard

        public Guard(int[][] guardarray,
             int t)
        Creates a guard given its personality and its successive positions
        Parameters:
        guardarray - guard's path, array that contains the guard's successive coordinates
        t - guard's personality can be rookie(0), drunken(1) or suspicious(2)

    • Method Detail

      • getGuard

        public int[][] getGuard()
        Gets the guard path
        Returns:
        array containing the guard's successive positions

      • getGuardpos

        public int getGuardpos()
        Gets the guard's current position in it's path
        Returns:
        index of guard's current coordinates in the path's array

      • GuardMove

        public void GuardMove(Map m)
        Moves the guard to it's next position in the path given its type (a rookie's next position index is current+1, a drunken may be asleep and may change movement direction when he wakes up, a suspicious guard may change its direction randomly); the method also updates the guard's position in the map.
        Parameters:
        m - Map of the current level
